Html:
How can we generate multiple excel file from the one work sheet for different  values group.

ex-:

$sql query= " SELECT * from company"

generate output ->

Com Name	Package Name
xx	              BPQ
yy	              BPQ
xx	              BPQ
xx	              EP
yy	              EP
xx	              EP
xx                    FQ
yy                    FQ

How can I generate separate excel sheet for each package.
     eg-: bbq.xls, EP.xls,Fq.xls

I appreciate any response.  Thank you!

Do you want different files? or several worksheets within the same workbook file?

If the latter, then use the createSheet() or addSheet() methods to create each additional worksheet
